Pre-Game Insights: India’s campaign at the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup moves to the Caribbean after a run of matches in the USA, and that change of venue brings with it some big selection decisions to make.
The India squad for the tournament contains four spinners in the 15, but only two were utilised in New York, bowling just nine overs across the three completed matches.
West Indies legend Sir Wesley Hall interacted cheerfully with the Indian players at their training in Barbados.
Yuzvendra Chahal or Kuldeep Yadav could be used here in Barbados.
We feel we've got the experience and the knowledge and also the ability to counteract different situations that may present themselves.
Each situation is unique, I can't set it in stone, I believe in flexibility.
